title: Female sports anchor rips Greg Hardy, NFL in monologue
text:
Posted: 6:07 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 Female sports anchor rips Greg Hardy, NFL in monologue Related > More Sponsored Links 
When the Cowboys host the Patriots this Sunday, there will be boos for the Patriots' Tom Brady, who dominated headlines this summer after Deflategate allegations flew around like his touchdown passes to Julian Edelman and Rob Gronkowski in last season's Super Bowl. 
Newly acquired Cowboys defensive end Greg Hardy will aslo have critics amongst the home crowd. 
Hardy was cut by the Carolina Panthers in March after being accused of domestic violence. He returns to the field for the first time this Sunday for Dallas after serving a 4-game suspension. 
>> Read more trending stories 
On her show "Garbage Time" Wednesday, host Katie Nolan ripped Hardy and the NFL in a monologue based on his answers to reporters' questions. Hardy said he wants to come out with "guns blazing" even though he was accused of throwing his ex-girlfriend on a futon with loaded rifles. 
He then went out of his way and mentioned Brady's supermodel wife. Hardy was also asked about another quarterback's wife by another reporter. 
Nolan's video circulated social media rapidly Thursday. Her response is full of ire and even some satire.
